p: Ginger is frequently used in Jamaica as an antiemetic and antinauseant. In addition to having antioxidant, antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory, and anticoagulant properties, fresh ginger, as opposed to dried, has also been reported to be antiviral, inhibiting human respiratory syncytial virus-induced plaques in human upper (HEp-2) and low (A549) respiratory tract cell lines [ 46].
